fields.name: allMessages

javadoc: Adds this string to the list of sent messages, for recall using the up/down arrow keys

methods.name: getRecentChat
javadoc: Gets the list of messages previously sent through the chat GUI

methods.name: isChatFocused
javadoc: Returns true if the chat GUI is open

methods.name: removeById
javadoc: finds and deletes a Chat line by ID

methods.name: resetChatScroll
javadoc: Resets the chat scroll (executed when the GUI is closed, among others)
